about_the_game:
Congratulations! You have just been hired by the Benoga Police Department. Investigate the horrible events happening in the city, learn its secrets and stay on the job as long as possible until you are eaten by another monster or something even worse happens....

"Police, Open The Door!" lets you experience what it means to be a police officer in a totalitarian state. It is a mix of visual novel with world exploration elements, where each element will tell you the centuries-old history of Benoga. Once upon a time, it was the only stronghold of the free world, but now - everything has changed. Each element, whether it's a book in the library or a random passerby on the street, will tell you why this happened.

You will have to choose between "Right" and "Bad", "Fair" and "Honest", "Good" and "Evil". And the most important thing is not to get confused in this choice, having defined for yourself what these concepts mean

EXPLORE THE WORLD
With a stunning, well-crafted plot, delve into the tangled history of Benoga and learn the secrets behind her

EVERY CHOICE MATTERS
No matter is it to save a cat from a tree or to give a bribe - every choice will lead you to one or another ending.

SURVIVE
It is not that easy to be a police officer in a machiavellian state. And not easy in double to survive against mythical creatures, isn't it?

CHOOSE YOUR SIDE
Of course you serve the order. But does it matter - you serve the good side? Every day spent in Benoga you can be closer to change your side..

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Higher
  • Memory: 4196 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
